beans

Class InferenceBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • beans.InferenceBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InferenceBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Arisa C. Ochavez Connects the application to the Bayesian Network through the functionalities of the jSMILE library
    See Also:

      • doInference

        public static void doInference(RiskFactor[] selectedRfs,
               java.util.List<StrokeType> st)
                        throws smile.SMILEException
        Perform Bayesian inference by setting selected risk factors with their respective range values as evidences
        Parameters:
        selectedRfs - - list of observed risk factors as selected by the user
        st - - list of stroke types
        Throws:
        smile.SMILEException

      • getProbValue

        public static double getProbValue(java.lang.String nodeName,
                  java.lang.String stateName)
                           throws smile.SMILEException
        Method for retrieving the probability value from the Bayesian network
        Parameters:
        nodeName - - name of the node where to retrieve the probability value from
        stateName - - name of the node's state where to retrieve the probability value from
        Returns:
        probability value (double data type)
        Throws:
        smile.SMILEException

      • addNode

        public static void addNode(java.lang.String nodeName,
           java.util.List<java.lang.String> parents,
           java.util.List<java.lang.String> children,
           java.util.List<State> states)
                    throws smile.SMILEException
        Add (insert) new node to the Bayesian network
        Parameters:
        nodeName - - name of the node to be added
        parents - - antecedent of the new node
        children - - precedent of the new node
        states - - state names (range values) of the new node
        Throws:
        smile.SMILEException

             java.lang.String childName)
        Method for adding a connection from a node to another
        Parameters:
        parentName - - name of parent to establish a connection from
        childName - - name of child to establish a connection to
        Returns:
